about_the_game:
2D Customizable Character is back with Female generator parts for Game Character Hub to match the previously released Male pack. You will again find the top-quality characters that you love, and that you can use in any game engine! This asset contains multiples generator parts that you can assemble together to create RPG Maker characters or high resolution characters.

Features:

- Use the characters in any game engine! The characters remain compatible with RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.
- Create both high-resolution characters or RPG Maker characters.
- Ships with preconfigured random character generators.
- Contains all the fighting animations you would want for an A-RPG game.

Contents:

The pack contains 88 high-resolution generator parts, and 78 RPG Maker compatible parts. This extends roughly to:

- 1 body template
- 2 armor types
- 11 hair types
- 2 make ups
- 4 belts
- 12 eyebrows
- 4 pairs of eyes
- 6 pairs of gloves
- 6 headgears
- 7 mouths
- 2 pairs of pants
- 4 shirts
- 5 skirts
- 3 pairs of shoes
- 8 shoulder pads
- 10 weapons (exclusive to high resolution version only)

The high resolution version ships with 8 animations (idle, walk, dead, ranged attack, swing attack, thrust attack, hurt, spellcasting), each in 4 directions. The body template is roughly 100px wide, 200px tall (faced down).

The RPG Maker version ships with characters that are a bit larger than regular RPG Maker MV/MZ characters, but remain perfectly handled by RPG Maker and blend-in nicely. The walk view frame takes 48x64 pixels, and the SV frame takes 96x96 pixels. The other views are taking the usual RPG Maker MV and MZ size.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: 1.4GHZ
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Card
